articles.description: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe and his players are one game from legendary status after an emotional night on Tyneside, says BBC Sport Chief Football Writer Phil McNulty
articles.title: Newcastle 2-0 Arsenal: Magpies have Wembley date with destiny in Carabao Cup final

articles.description: Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce says it will be "pretty cool" and an "honour" to play in front of US president Donald Trump in Super Bowl 59.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025: Travis Kelce says playing in front of President Trump 'an honour'

articles.description: The NFL's international growth continues with Australia being confirmed as the latest overseas host of a regular-season game.
articles.title: NFL Australia: Melbourne Cricket Ground to host first game in 2026

articles.description: Arsenal's first trophy hopes of the season are left in tatters by Newcastle - as fans are yet again left rueing their lack of a striker.
articles.title: Arsenal: 'Not enough' - 'toothless' Gunners miss out again after losing to Newcastle

articles.description: Real Madrid need an injury-time winner from rookie Gonzalo Garcia to beat Leganes in the Copa del Rey quarter-final.
articles.title: Leganés 2-3 Real Madrid: Gonzalo Garcia's late winner decides Copa del Rey quarter-final

articles.description: The US Open becomes the first major to provide players on the LIV Golf tour with an exemption for the tournament.
articles.title: US Open becomes first major to give LIV golfers exemption for tournament
